name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
description: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

skills.name: Grazioso
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Maestoso
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Vaneggiando
skills.description: Makes a single target have a high chance of entering <u>Alien Dream</u>.

skills.name: Accelerando
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.

skills.name: Accrescendo
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.

skills.name: Volteggiando
skills.description: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Volteggiando
skills.description: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Tempestoso
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. After using this ability, restores Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Allargando
skills.description: Enters the "If We Live In the Light" state, gains a Shield, increases the DMG dealt, decreases the DMG taken, and makes Toughness immune to reduction.

skills.name: Im Anfang war das Wort
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. After 7 turns, uses "Im Anfang war die Tat."

skills.name: Im Anfang war die Tat
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. This DMG application ignores the targets' DEF.

skills.name: Work of Creation
skills.description: "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday has weaknesses of all Types. While "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday is in the "Im Anfang war die Kraft" state, it will immediately take action after every action taken by targets and becomes immune to action delay effects caused by targets. When it becomes Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed. Moreover, after one stack of its Toughness is Broken, it applies <u>Walk in the Light</u> to targets.

skills.name: Come Un Sogno
skills.description: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus summons 4 "Echoes of Faded Dreams." The DMG dealt to the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and Echoes of Faded Dreams become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply the <u>Walk in the Light</u> state to targets.
